import React from 'react'; import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm'; import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup'; import Footer from './Footer'; function App() { const [onEditAvatar, setOpenEditAvatar] = React.useState(false); const [onEditProfile, setOpenEditProfile] = React.useState(false); const [onAddPlace, setOpenAddPlace] = React.useState(false); const isEditAvatarPopupOpen = () => { setOpenEditAvatar(true) }; const isEditProfilePopupOpen = () => { setOpenEditProfile(true) }; const isAddPlacePopupOpen = () => { setOpenAddPlace(true) }; const closeAllPopups = () => { setOpenEditAvatar(false); setOpenEditProfile(false); setOpenAddPlace(false); } return (
} />
